duly 8, 1986

 

    

 

Gi Ge

Dr. Robert F. Gertenbach eee
The Council for Tobacco Research--USA

900 Third Avenue

New York, NY 10022 RE: 1886

Dear Or. Gertenbach:

I am pleased to accept your award for our research project
entitled “Oncogenes Active in Colon Cancer".

Enclosed is the revised budget and other information you
have requested.

‘Thank you for your support and I look forward to working
with you and your staff.

Sincerely yours,

dames N. Pipas
Associate Professor

MP: swt

Enclosures

PITTSBURGH, PA 15260,

 

50189128

summary: Dr. Robert F. Gertenbach eee received an award from the Council for Tobacco Research. The award was for a research project entitled ‘Oncogenes Active in Colon Cancer’ The project was to study the effects of tobacco on colon cancer.
